title: Astra Properties
description: Modern real estate website built with React & Tailwind, with a primary focus on a sleek glass design and minimalism.

title: Luna Cloud
description: Minimalistic cloud storage website built with React & Tailwind, with a heavy focus on ease-of-use and beautiful design.

title: Quick News
description: Modern news website built with React & Tailwind that leverages NewsAPI for providing users with a quick and easy way to get updated news.

title: Quick Shorten
description: Minimal link shortening web app made with React & Tailwind that leverages the Bitly API for shrinking links quickly and easily.

title: Astra Feedback
description: Signup/login web app that focuses on storing user data locally, encrypting user password and opening a feedback form page for showcase.

title: Astra Weather
description: Minimalistic weather app built with React & Tailwind that leverages WeatherAPI for current weather data and a 3 day forecast.

title: Holo Notes
description: Minimal note-taking web app made with Vue & Tailwind, with local data storing.

title: Quick Pass
description: Minimal password generator web app made with Vue & Tailwind, with password customization options.

title: AstraPhone X
description: Product landing and preordering page for a fake phone called AstraPhone X, built with React & the Tailwind library RippleUI.
